item.title: AI Resume Editor - Alpha
item.description:
Today we are releasing an early version of the Resume Editor, a web-based tool for creating and managing resumes.

This is an alpha release. This means we are still actively adding features and fixing bugs. The project is open source, and we are looking for feedback.
